data.text: Momfa ahurisie nto dwom mma Awurade, mo teneneefoɔ,
Momfa sankuo nkamfo Awurade;
Monto dwom foforɔ mma no.
Awurade asɛm tene, na ɛyɛ nokorɛ
Awurade dɔ teneneeyɛ ne atɛntenenee.
Awurade asɛm so na wɔnam yɛɛ ɔsorosoro,
Ɔka ɛpo nsuo boa ano kuo;
Momma asase sofoɔ nyinaa nsuro Awurade;
Ɔno na ɔkasaeɛ na ɛbaa mu
Awurade sɛe amanaman no nhyehyɛeɛ;
Nanso, Awurade nhyehyɛeɛ tim hɔ daa,
Nhyira ne ɔman a ne Onyankopɔn ne Awurade,
Awurade hwɛ adasamma nyinaa firi soro.
Ɔfiri nʼatenaeɛ hwɛ wɔn a wɔte asase so nyinaa.
Ɔno ne deɛ ɔbɔɔ wɔn nyinaa akoma,
Ɛnyɛ ɔhene akodɔm kɛseɛ na ɛbɛgye no;
Ɔpɔnkɔ mu ahotosoɔ yɛ kwa wɔ nkwagyeɛ mu;
Nanso Awurade ani wɔ wɔn a wɔsuro no no so,
sɛ ɔbɛgye wɔn afiri owuo mu
Yɛde anidasoɔ twɛn Awurade;
Ne mu na yɛn akoma di ahurisie,
Ma wʼadɔeɛ a ɛnsa da no ntena yɛn so, Ao Awurade,
